name: Time for Walkies
description:
Time for Walkies is a short Bitsy game about walking a dog. 

Visit the town, beach, or dog park. Sniff a lot. Each even more.

Good dog. 

Made using Bitsy Game Maker https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy 

DUSTBYTE PALETTE Created by polyphorge https://lospec.com/palette-list/dustbyte
